description: Updates the configuration of the storage optimizers for a table.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: Name of the database where the table is present.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: Name of the table for which to enable the storage optimizer.

parameters.name: StorageOptimizerConfig
parameters.description: Name of the configuration for the storage optimizer. (string) --- (dict) --- (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Result
nested_items.description: A response indicating the success of failure of the operation.
